content: A group of men have forced their way into a home and fired several shots while confronting a man in what police believe was a targeted attack in Brisbane's south.

The 22-year-old fled after the men forced their way into the Kuraby property late Monday night and brandished a firearm.Police say the man was unhurt and nothing was stolen from the home.The men left in a white SUV, and a vehicle believed to be the one used by the group was later set alight several kilometres away in the suburb of Mansfield.Police are calling with anyone with security or dashcam video to come forward.
